dc:title: On Pilgrimage - June 1960
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Comments on not being arrested at the annual civil disobedience against New York City's air raid drills. Visits Tamar in Vermont. Continues her account of a West Coast trip focusing on the farm labor situation there.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 765 1960-06-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
